verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: began] [ARG1: his first day in Singapore] [ARG2: with a series of tweets in defense of his trade policies] , [ARGM-ADV: criticizing Canada and the European Union over trade surpluses and saying the Europeans should be spending more on defense] .
